ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Sticker shock!
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to Paw and get a Kisch der Pavz ;o) 1H Slash, Magic, Lore, No Drop. can be used in secondary hand, 10/38, +5 Dex, Effect: STRONG poison Have I stated
ygData.messageBody:
Go to Paw and get a Kisch der Pavz ;o)

1H Slash, Magic, Lore, No Drop. can be used in secondary hand, 10/38, +5
Dex, Effect: STRONG poison

Have I stated recently that I love my Kisch? Okay then... "I love my
Kisch!"
there ;p

-=B=-
Kisch Weilder
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: Elijah Meeker <emeeker@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:16 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Sticker shock!


>
> >
> > the only thing i can think of is that they are used for the wizard's
> > runescale cloak quest from the temple of sol ro. when that
> > quest started
> > was when i saw the price jump. personally, i would go with a
> > cloak of the
> > icebear, it is more AC and has HP which never hurts. not
> > remarkable, and
> > arguably not better, but considering it is less expensive you
> > can argue for
> > the icebear. before i got my HBC i did switch out the
> > lizardscale for an
> > icebear. even though only 1 AC my total went up 3 points.
>
>
> Okay, weird, I am now seeing the AC for the lizard scale cloak listed as 8
> on two sites...at any rate, it IS cheaper...I will have to get my last 5
dex
> to 100 some ohter way...
>
>
> Tszaaz
